text: Kaya to manusya, jo ratricya veli sajada ani ubhe rahanyacya avastheta upasana karanyata ghalavita asela, akhiratace bhaya balagata asela ani apalya palanakartyacya daya - krpeci asa balagata asela, ani to, jo yacya ulata asela, samana asu sakatata, bare he sanga ki vidvana ani ajnani doghe samana aheta? Nihsansaya, bodha tara teca prapta karatata, je bud'dhimana asatila
